DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double-blinded , placebo-controlled trial use . Healthy full-time undergraduate student recruit University Florida via flyer , email , announcement , etc . Informed consent obtain inclusion/exclusion criterion review determine whether participant qualifies study . All participant consent main six-week intervention subgroup ( n=50/group ) student consent provide two stool sample . Participants provide saliva stool sample ( sub-group ) pre-baseline week week final exam approximately week 4 . At randomization visit , height , weight age obtain . Participants stratify base body mass index randomize via seal envelope one four group : Lactobacillus helveticus , Bifidobacterium longum ssp . Infantis , Bifidobacterium bifidum placebo ( n=145/group ) . Participants take study provide capsule probiotic placebo daily 6 week . Participants receive daily questionnaire via email throughout prebaseline week 6-week intervention . Daily questionnaire ask intake supplement , cold symptom , general health ( i.e. , new medication , doctor visit ) . Throughout study , participant also ask complete weekly questionnaire ( inquire gastrointestinal symptom physical activity ) Quality Life Questionnaires ( administer pre-baseline , final exam week week 6 study ) .
DOC.criteria: To participate study must : 18 year age old . healthy fulltime undergraduate University Florida . willing complete daily questionnaire form via computer . willing discontinue immuneenhancing dietary supplement ( e.g. , prebiotics fiber supplement , probiotic , echinacea , fish oil , vitamin E > 400 % RDA > 60 mg/day ) . willing take probiotic capsule daily 6 week . least one cold last 12 month . least 1 final schedule exam week . daily access Internet . To participate study must NOT : current smoker . chronic allergy involve upper respiratory tract . immunosuppressive illness treatment within last year . receive antibiotic therapy past two month .
